attributes.action: Allow Jeremy Corbyn to negotiate with ISIL/ISIS/Deash in Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
Corbyn has had a long and successful history with terrorists. 

The country believes he is the man with the plan.
attributes.background: The terror group must be stopped. Jeremy Corbyn is the only man who can talk to terrorists.

rejection.details: This is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament as a whole.
